name: Powerline
description:
"Oh good, you're here!"

"Look, the job is simple, press that big button over there to drop the poles out of the plane.  The lines will auto-magically connect, Goblin engineering can do beautiful things. Just make sure you hit some substations, to offload some power, and mind the solar plants, this line is overloaded as it is."

[W] or [Up Arrow] = Move up

[S] or [Down Arrow] =  Move down

*You can also move with the mouse

[Space] or [Left Click] =  Place pole

[B] = Hide Mouse

Note:

I hope this plays well, I just picked up Godot ~three days before starting this game jam, enjoy! #FirstGameJam
